titleStmt.title: The kynges most royall maiestie being enfourmed ...
Proclamations. 1538-11-16
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet. regius impressor excudebat. Cum privilegio,

notesStmt.note: Title from opening words of text.
Prohibiting unlicensed importation and printing of books, requiring observance of church ceremonies, removing St. Thomas à Becket from the calendar, etc.--STC.
First leaf only filmed on reel 10.
Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 1483 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
